item.title: How to post a site to IPFS easily
item.description: There’s a bit of a chicken-and-egg problem with IPFS to get pages to link to each other that is frusturating to IPFS users. To have the IPFS hash for the link you first need to get the IPFS hash of the other link. One way around this is to make all the URLs relative. This is a lot easier to do than you think. First make a blog however you want and then host it locally, e.
